title: Metal Tracker
description: A script that scrapes websites for metal concerts and reviews and sends daily email updates. Runs on a Linux server with CRON and SQLite. I'm particularly proud of the integration testing suite!

title: Dotfiles
description: My personal setup for all my development environments. Includes Zsh, custom functions, and backup scripts. Because why not automate everything?

title: Code Notes
description: A curated collection of programming insights and practical tips. It's my go-to for remembering terminal commands and best practices. Built with MkDocs.

title: Portfolio
description: You're looking at it! My personal portfolio to showcase projects. Built from scratch using Go and minimal HTML/CSS/JS. It's all about keeping things simple and effective!

title: Nginx Config
description: The config that keeps my projects online! Nginx setup for serving multiple sites on an Ubuntu VPS behind Cloudflare.

title: Home Server
description: An Ansible playbook to automate my home server setup, including Docker, media services, and dynamic DNS with Cloudflare.

title: Codewars JS
description: A collection of JavaScript challenges focused on small coding exercises called "katas".
